name: PEPE OPTIMUS
description: PEPE OPTIMUS is a Crypto currency with combination of $PEPE and $OPTIMUS. Born of a desire to challenge the limits of Both Optimus and pepe of being just a meme token. It Aims to create a fun and engaging community while also building unique utilities like Gaming rewards to $PEPO NFT holders and a unique use case of $PEPO token in our game. $PEPO is more than just a meme and will come with different utilities like betting in Game with $PEPO token and earning rewards with PEPO NFTs according to their Tiers. Our NFT is not based just on NFT Staking utility, PEPO NFTs are the main asset of our upcoming game where races will be conduct with PEPO NFTs and you will be rewarded based on the Tiers of NFT you are playing with. We also intend to reward our NFT holders with additional tokens just for holding our NFTs every day.
